mapper.sql: id, entry_order_id, ebs_warehouse_id, ebs_warehouse_levl_2, self_warehouse_id, material_type_id, amount, price, entry_user_id, entry_date, leave_factory, production_date, expir_day, expir_date, confirm, entry_class, confirm_amount, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, confirm_user_id

sql.trim: #{item.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.entryOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ebsWarehouseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ebsWarehouseLevl2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.selfWarehouseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialTypeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.price, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.entryUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.entryDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.leaveFactory, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.productionDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.expirDay, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.expirDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.confirm, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.entryClass, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.confirmAmount, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.confirmUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select t.*,t1.realname as oprationUserName,t2.NAME as selfWarehouseName from bu_material_entry_4_detail t left join SYS_USER t1 on t1.id=t.opration_user_id left join bu_mtr_warehouse t2 on t2.id=t.self_warehouse_id where t.enter_detail_id=#{id}

SELECT t.*, t1.entry_no, t2.code AS materialTypeCode, t2.name AS materialTypeName, t2.spec AS materialTypeSpec, t2.unit AS materialTypeUnit, t2.category1 AS materialTypeCategory1, t3.name AS selfWarehouseName, t4.realname as entryUserName, t1.entry_dept_id, t5.depart_name as entryDeptName, t6.realname as confirmUserName FROM bu_material_entry_detail t LEFT JOIN bu_material_entry_order t1 on t1.id = t.entry_order_id LEFT JOIN bu_material_type t2 ON t2.id = t.material_type_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t3 ON t3.id = t.self_warehouse_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t4.id = t.entry_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_depart t5 ON t5.id = t1.entry_dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 ON t6.id = t.confirm_user_id where t.entry_order_id = #{entryOrderId} order by t2.code, t.entry_date desc

SELECT t.*, t1.entry_no, t2.code AS materialTypeCode, t2.name AS materialTypeName, t2.spec AS materialTypeSpec, t2.unit AS materialTypeUnit, t2.category1 AS materialTypeCategory1, t3.name AS selfWarehouseName, t4.realname as entryUserName, t1.entry_dept_id, t5.depart_name as entryDeptName, t6.realname as confirmUserName FROM bu_material_entry_detail t LEFT JOIN bu_material_entry_order t1 on t1.id = t.entry_order_id LEFT JOIN bu_material_type t2 ON t2.id = t.material_type_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t3 ON t3.id = t.self_warehouse_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t4.id = t.entry_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_depart t5 ON t5.id = t1.entry_dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 ON t6.id = t.confirm_user_id where t.id = #{entryDetailId}
